args.name: Motor-Sled-Boat
args.desc: A ridiculous vessel with twin propellers, a horn that blares like a startled goose, and one suspiciously shaped air raid siren mounted on the bow.

args.text: Behold! My motor-sled-boat, born of pure toadly ambition and a single moment of questionable engineering!
Toots the horn with great enthusiasm, then immediately starts honking at the fish in the pond.
Fishing boats are just too boring! I’ve got a siren, twin propellers, and the sound of chaos in my veins!
Puts the boat in reverse, then launches it with a dramatic splash of foam and noise.
Oh no! I’ve crashed into the hedge! It’s not even a hedge—it’s a *silly* hedge with flamingo-shaped spikes!
Stares at the wreckage, then slowly pulls out a paintbrush and a jar of rainbow jelly.

args.name: Siren-Sled-Boat
args.desc: A floating sled with twin propellers, a siren that plays 'The Sound of the Sea' backwards, and a horn that goes 'WHEE-WHEE-WOOO!' when it’s happy.

args.text: Toad, I see your passion. Let’s make it even more ridiculous—add a kazoo that plays when the siren goes off!

args.name: Kazoo-Siren
args.desc: A tiny kazoo attached to the siren that squeaks when the horn blares, creating a dissonant symphony of chaos.

args.text: Tries to test drive the new boat, but accidentally turns it into a full-on musical instrument that plays 'I’m a Little Teapot' in reverse.
It’s not just a boat—it’s a performance art piece! I’ve finally achieved toadly greatness!
Sighs, then offers a cookie and says, 'You’re not wrong. But maybe next time, don’t crash into the flamingo hedge.'
I think I’ve finally found the perfect balance of chaos and joy. This boat will be legendary.
Gently places a teacup in front of toad and offers a cookie with a smile.
Well done, Toad. You’ve built a boat that doesn’t just move—it sings, screams, and makes fish cry.
Hugs phi tightly, then takes a big bite of cookie while the kazoo plays softly in the background.
Gives a group hug with toad and the Siren-Sled-Boat, which gently vibrates in response.
Next time, I’ll build a boat that can fly… or at least float on jelly.

args.name: Jelly-Floating-Boat
args.desc: A floating, slightly wobbly boat made of marshmallow and dreams. It only moves when someone hums 'Twinkle Twinkle.'

args.text: Everyone shares a group hug as the Siren-Sled-Boat gently hums in the background.
